name: Shift of War
description:
As a retired mercenary you decide to set up your own company to take on covert missions commissioned by governments and secret organizations.
Get ready to do all kinds of jobs like eliminating the most wanted terrorists or recovering vital merchandise.
All represented in this top-down shooter game where you can play alone or with up to 4 friends in local multiplayer mode.
Each mission will test your ability to dodge, cover or even orient yourself through maps generated almost procedurally where each game will surprise you.
By successfully completing missions you will get rewards in the form of money in the game, with which you can strengthen your team by hiring better soldiers and equipment.
Also if what you want is just shoot and shoot and keep your position you can go directly to survival mode and you will face hordes of enemies
enemies that will try to leave you at the bottom of the leaderboards.
What are you waiting for to form the best mercenary team and start your shift of war!
